column4: hello all im having an ishue with kvm virtualization in a ubuntu server install - failed to start domain - internal error process exited while connection to monitor: kvm : - drive - could not open disk image - i was thinking it was a permissions ishue so i chmod to 7777 both file and location to no avail - my linux skills are limited at best
What command are you using to start kvm?
Not familiar with virsh. What arguments are being passed to kvm?
Sorry, this seems to be a virsh problem so I can't really help much.
